H0.text: Energy from the Sun evaporates water, which powers the water cycle.

H1.text: Energy from the Sun condenses water, thereby powering the water cycle.

H2.text: Energy from the Sun precipitates water, thereby powering the water cycle.

H3.text: Energy from the Sun collects water, thereby powering the water cycle.

A6.text: The sun (solar energy) drives evaporation of water from oceans, lakes, moisture in the soil, and other sources of water.

A7.text: Evaporation is an essential part of the water cycle.
